name: Maximum Madness
description:
OBJECTIVE: 

Drive an armed truck and get to the next checkpoint while eliminating bandits trying to rob your supplies.

At the checkpoint you'll obtain petrol as reward. Petrol can be used not only for refueling but repairing/upgrading  truck, purchasing weapons and reloading ammo.

Your mission will be failed if:

  • shield of the tractor or the trailer is completely broken
  • fuel runs out
  • time runs out
CONTROLS:

W,S : Throttle / Brake
A,D : Steer
LMB : Fire
Mouse : Move sight
1,2,3 or Wheel or click a turret directly : Select turret
Space : Return to the road (need to be below 15km/h)
E : Honk (as for now there's no meaning!)

NOTE:

This game is still in development.
As of now 2 stages are available. A stage is divided into 3 zones.
